method.name: Configure

method.description: returns the version identifiers of the driver

method.name: GetHeaderInformation
method.description: returns the header information

method.name: QueryParameters
method.description: Stores the driver parameters in the driver environment.

method.name: IsConnected
method.description: Checks if the card is connected.

param.name: IsConnected
param.description: Flag if the card is disconnected.

method.name: Disconnect
method.description: Disconnects and unregisters the card.

method.name: ResetToSystemDefaults
method.description: Resets the card settings to system defaults.

method.name: LaserOn
method.description: Turns the laser on.

method.name: LaserOff
method.description: Turns the laser off.

method.name: ArmLaser
method.description: Arms or disarms the laser.

param.name: ShallBeArmed
param.description: Shall the laser be armed or disarmed.

method.name: IsLaserArmed
method.description: Checks if the laser is armed.

param.name: LaserIsArmed
param.description: Flag if the laser is armed.

method.name: EnablePilot
method.description: Enables the pilot pointer.

method.name: PilotIsEnabled
method.description: Checks if the pilot is enabled.

param.name: PilotIsEnabled
param.description: Flag if the pilot is enabled.

method.name: GetLaserStatus
method.description: Returns the laser status.

param.name: PilotIsEnabled
param.description: Flag if the pilot is enabled.

param.name: LaserIsArmed
param.description: Flag if the laser is armed.

param.name: LaserAlarm
param.description: Flag if the laser is in alarm state.

method.name: DrawLayer
method.description: Draws a layer of a build stream. Blocks until the layer is drawn.

param.name: StreamUUID
param.description: UUID of the build stream. Must have been loaded in memory by the system.

param.name: LayerIndex
param.description: Layer index of the build file.

class.name: Driver_Raylase
class.description: A LaserScanner Driver for a Raylase card.

method.name: LoadSDK
method.description: Initializes the Raylase SDK.

method.name: ConnectByIP
method.description: Connects to the Raylase Scanner Card. Fails if connection is not successful.

param.name: CardName
param.description: Name of scanner to be connected to. MUST not be in use.

method.name: GetConnectedCard
method.description: Retrieves a connected card instance.

param.name: CardName
param.description: Name of scanner card to retrieve. MUST have been connected before.

method.name: GetVersion

param.name: Minor

param.name: Micro
param.description: returns the micro version of this library

method.description: Returns the last error recorded on this object

param.description: Is there a last error to query
